FuncDef:
The flow-statistic command enables the system to collect the statistics about the volume of the upstream or downstream traffic of a user in a domain.
The undo flow-statistic command disables the system from collecting the statistics about the volume of the upstream or downstream traffic of a user in a domain.
By default, the system collects the statistics about the volume of the upstream or downstream traffic of a user in a domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Collects the statistics about the volume of the upstream traffic of a user in a domain.
-

Collects the statistics about the volume of the downstream traffic of a user in a domain.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the system to collect the statistics about the volume of the upstream or downstream traffic of users in a domain, run the flow-statistic command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
